biotools.summary: PseudoDomain is used to identify processed pseudogenes of mammalian genomes. Unlike most existing tools, it is based on profile HMM-based homology search. It searches genomic sequences against protein domain database.Therefore, when protein annotations of the genome is not available, it still can accurately identify processed pseudogenes.
